name: Somakub
description:
Context :

This Game was made back in 2011, it was a 6 month project for the DUT (two-year university degree in technology). It was a team of 4 people. I was in charge of the 3D rendering, UI programming, game design and asset creation. The game was made with the XNA framework.

Gameplay :

You select the mode you want with enter.

In play mode you select the level you want to play and then the gameplay start

- arrow keys to rotate the camera

- zqsd in order to translate the puzzle piece (polycube)

- oklm in order to rotate the puzzle polycube

- enter to confirm the position of the polycube

- 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 to select the corresponding polycube
